mapper.sql: id, pasture_name, pasture_range, pasture_quality, pasture_lng, pasture_lat, pasture_remark, pasture_record_time, pasture_operator
mapper.insert:
insert into pasture (pasture_name, pasture_range, pasture_quality, pasture_lng, pasture_lat, pasture_remark, pasture_record_time, pasture_operator) values
(#{item.pastureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pastureRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pastureQuality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pastureLng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pastureLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pastureRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pastureRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.pastureOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
